text:
James Corden put Jennifer Lopez in the hot seat on The Late Late Show on Thursday night (May 4).

Host Corden did his best to get J. Lo to to spill the goods on her new romance with baseball great Alex Rodriguez. He started out by saying, “You’ve been spending some time in Miami,” then pretended to forget who Lopez is currently dating, but kept digging for an answer. Ultimately Ms. Jenny from the Block admitted to spending time with Yankee’s former star third baseman, A-Rod.

The questioning made Lopez blush. “Please don’t do this to me,” she begged. “It’s a devilishly handsome couple,” Corden complimented. “Thank you. He’s the best. You would love him,” Lopez replied. “Honestly, he’s a great guy. He’s fun. He’s awesome.”

Lopez, who will debut her new international dance competition show World of Dance later this month on NBC, was all smiles as she talked about her new Instagram official beau — even when Corden said, “You’re glowing in the same way I would glow if I were to kiss A-Rod.”

Watch the interview below:

title: James Corden Grills Jennifer Lopez About Alex Rodriguez: “Please Don’t Do This to Me!”
